full_summary:
=====================================

## Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)

For Availability of Space for Lease in the Town of Oakville, Ontario

### Solicitation Information

* **File Number**: 81001956
* **Reference Number**: cb-568-90028521
* **Solicitation Number**: 81001956
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-14T17:00:00

### Notice Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Real estate services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information (RFI)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity

* **Public Services and Procurement Canada**
  10th floor - 4900 Yonge St.
  Toronto, Ontario M2N 6A6

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Vaylon Fernandes
* **Email**: [vaylon.ferandes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vaylon.fernandes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (416) 995-1590
* **Fax**: (416) 952-6481

### Attachments

Attachments are available for download in English and French from the Canada Buys website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25032/81001956---eoi-oakville-canadabuys-en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25032/81001956---eoi-oakville-canadabuys-fr.pdf (French)ी
=====================================

Just for reference, I used the following criteria to determine the necessary details to include in the rewritten text:

*   Solicitation number, reference number, and file number
*   Publication and tender closing dates
*   Notice type, procurement method, trade agreements, and regions of opportunity
*   Contracting entity and contact information
*   Link to attachments (in both English and French)
